ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] ISO loacations
ygData.msgSnippet: i think there is a place that sells something in east commons...it is the little hut next to Inn 1 i believe..i dont remember what they sell, but i m almost
ygData.messageBody:
i think there is a place that sells something in east commons...it is the
little hut next to Inn 1 i believe..i dont remember what they sell, but i'm
almost possitive it has something to do with baking..not sure though..also
in east commons, in Inn 1, i think the 2 girls sell stuff for sewing...and
then for silk yuo must kill and thing that looks spiderish, except for
spiderling silk..that wont work..all this info oyu probably know..but just
in case...

Mumdadar 26 Wiz (Bristlebane)

----- Original Message -----
From: <alliani@...>
To: <alliani@...>
Sent: Sunday, April 23, 2000 2:47 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] ISO loacations


> I'm compiling a listing of zones and the various locations of required
> elements for any/all trade skills (ie: oven, forge, pottery wheel,
> shops/merchants to buy supplies, mobs that drop useful items as loot,
> etc.). Any input, including cities, shops/merchants names, /loc's,
> websites with info, etc. greatly appreciated.
>
> TIA

> Lori
